Package com.github.anno4j.model.impl.motivation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bookmarking
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#bookmarking The motivation that represents the creation of a bookmark to the target resources or recorded point or points within one or more resources.
    Classifying
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#classifying The motivation that represents the assignment of a classification type, typically from a controlled vocabulary, to the target resource(s).
    Commenting
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#commenting The motivation that represents a commentary about or review of the target resource(s).
    Describing
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#describing The motivation that represents a description of the target resource(s), as opposed to a comment about them.
    Editing
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#editing The motivation that represents a request for a modification or edit to the target resource.
    Highlighting
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#highlighting The motivation that represents a highlighted section of the target resource or segment.
    Identifying
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#identifying The motivation that represents the assignment of an identity to the target resource(s).
    Linking
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#linking The motivation that represents an untyped link to a resource related to the target.
    Moderating
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#moderating The motivation that represents an assignment of value or quality to the target resource(s).
    Questioning
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#questioning The motivation that represents asking a question about the target resource(s).
    Replying
    Conforms to http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#replying The motivation that represents a reply to a previous statement, either an Annotation or another resource.
    Tagging
    http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#tagging The motivation that represents adding a Tag on the target resource(s).
